standard.name: Facility has defined & established procedure for Community Participation for providing assured services
Facility has procedure for collecting & Reporting of the health facility related information
The facility has defined procedures for registration and consultation of patients.
Facility provides National Health Programmes as per operational/clinical guidelines of the Government
Facility has defined procedure for primary management and continuity of care with appropriate maintenance of records
Facility provides Adolescent reproductive & sexual health services as per guideline
Facility has defined & establish procedure for Diagnostic Services
Facility has defined & implemented procedures for Drug administration and standard treatment guideline as mandated by Government
Facility has established procedure for care of New born & Child as per guideline
The facility has establish procedure for Maternal health care as per guideline
Facility has establish procedure for Family Planning as per Govt guideline
Facility has defined & establish procedure for segregation, collection, treatment & disposal of Bio medical & hazardous waste
Facility ensures availability of Personal Protective equipment & follows standard precautions.
Facility has defined & implemented procedure for ensuring Hand hygiene practices & asepsis
Facility has standard procedure for disinfection &sterilization of equipment & instrument
Facility has established quality Assurance Program as per state/National guidelines
Facility has established system for Patients and employees satisfaction
Facility has established ,documented &implemented standard operating procedure system for its all key processes .
The facility measures its productivity, efficiency, clinical care & service Quality indicators
Facility endeavours to improve its performance to meet bench marks
Use of standards materials and Equipment for Cleaning
Cleanliness of Ambulatory Area (OPD, Emergency, Lab)
Equipment and Supplies for Bio Medical Waste Management
Segregated Collection and Transportation of Biomedical Waste
Training and Capacity Building and Standardization
Use of standards materials and Equipment for Cleaning
Use of Standard Methods for Cleaning
Collection and Transportation of Biomedical Waste
Equipment and Supplies for Bio Medical Waste Management
Training and Capacity Building and Standardization
Cleanliness of Auxiliary Areas( Office, Meeting Room, Staff Room, Record Room)
Use of standards materials and Equipment for Cleaning
Cleanliness of Circulation Area (Corridors, Waiting area, Lobby, Stairs)
Cleanliness of Procedure Areas(Dressing Room, Immunization, Injection Room, Labour Room (if available))
Use of Standard Methods for Cleaning
Collection and Transportation of Biomedical Waste
Equipment and Supplies for Bio Medical Waste Management
Training and Capacity Building and Standardization
The facility has defined and established procedures for informing patients about the medical condition, and involving them in treatment planning, and facilitates informed decision making
The facility provides the information to care seekers, attendants & community about the available services and their modalities
The facility maintains privacy, confidentiality & dignity of patient, and has a system for guarding patient related information.
Services are delivered in a manner that is sensitive to gender, religious and cultural needs, and there are no barrier on account of physical economic, cultural or social reasons.
The facility ensures that there are no financial barrier to access, and that there is financial protection given from the cost of hospital services.
The facility has adequate qualified and trained staff, required for providing the assured services to the current case load
Facility has a defined and established procedure for effective utilization, evaluation and augmentation of competence and performance of staff
The facility has equipment & instruments required for assured list of services.
The facility has infrastructure for delivery of assured services, and available infrastructure meets the prevalent norms
The facility has established Programme for fire safety and other disaster
The facility ensures the physical safety of the infrastructure.
The facility provides drugs and consumables required for assured services.
The facility ensures 24X7 water and power backup as per requirement of service delivery, and support services norms
The facility has established Programme for inspection, testing and maintenance and calibration of Equipment.
Roles & Responsibilities of administrative and clinical staff are determined as per govt. regulations and standards operating procedures.
The facility provides safe, secure and comfortable environment to staff, patients and visitors.
The facility ensures clean linen to the patients
The facility has defined procedures for storage, inventory management and dispensing of drugs in pharmacy and patient care areas
The facility has established Programme for maintenance and upkeep of the facility
The facility has defined and established procedures for continuity of care of patient and referral
The facility has a procedure to identify high risk and vulnerable patients.
The facility has defined procedures for registration, consultation and admission of patients.
The facility has defined and established procedures of diagnostic services
The facility has defined procedures for safe drug administration
The facility has defined and established procedures for maintaining, updating of patients’ clinical records and their storage
The facility has defined and established procedures for Emergency Services and Disaster Management
The facility has defined and established procedures for nursing care
